quest:quest.quest:name: Finding the Guild
quest:quest.quest:description: It has been proven true that there is a Witchhunter's Guild that hides in plain sight. Peer your eyes past the veil of what is to be perceived as the "normal world", for beneath the hood of a "Guild Brother" - are eyes that see the shapes in the dark for what they are. Not every shadow is an illusion, as you will soon enter a world that specializes in containing and destroying things of the paranormal and supernatural. Before you can call yourself a brother to these brave folk, you must prove your worth by accomplishing the tasks given to you.

quest:rewards.quest:reward: You have discovered the Guild's inner chambers and now walk among them as an adept member. You are still a Young Blood, so tread carefully... Hold your loyalty to your heart until you know who is your brother and who is not.

The shop is now open to you, as your honour has been proven and your loyalty is a credit among even the most courageous here. You are now a Guild-Brother, meaning you can attend to the needs of the Guild now, as per your responsibility. A quest is always waiting for courageous folk.

quest:quest-state.quest:description: After your encounter with Yip, you have retained the knowledge necessary to find the Guild in the "Beggar's Alley" district of Sevgard. The time has come to let your intentions with them be known.

The Guild Captain, Adrian Claw-Marked, has entrusted you with numerous tasks so that you may join his brotherhood. Travel to the Farmlands, where you will meet a farmer and assist him a construction effort that will benefit the Guild. Bring with you 10 Robinia Logs, 100 Bronze Nails and prepare to exert yourself (10 Movement Points) to prove your worth.
Adrian Claw-Marked will be pleased to hear that you assists his comrades. Return to the Guild and receive your next assignment, for you are now another step closer to your goal.

The Guild Captain Adrian seems to trust you more and more. He has tasked you to enter the Whispering Forest and assist some Guild Young Bloods. The rookies require your help in investigating a mysterious hole.
Your journey into the hole proved courageous, but now your courage is put to the test. Fight the Goblin Champion and do not falter!

You are worthy of a song titled after you! After killing the Goblin Champion, one of the rookies have you a leader from Adrian. You must find one of the lost Guild Brothers in the Cemetery where you met Yip.
Guild member Kian was deceased, his death taunts you but suddenly - his corpse is now among the Guild's enemies. You know what must be done.

Kian's corpse has been reclaimed to its natural state of death, but you have no peace of mind. Sadness is strung across your heart like a decoration, even with your newfound membership in the Guild. At the very least, Kian's brothers will be of service to you and so will you be to them.
